scripts.installLocalOptimism: git clone git@github.com:ethereum-optimism/optimism.git && cd optimism/ops && docker-compose pull
scripts.checkLocalOptimismReady: cd optimism/ops && scripts/wait-for-sequencer.sh && echo 'System is ready to accept transactions'
scripts.compile:ovm: rm -rf client/contracts/optimism-contracts && truffle compile --config truffle-config.ovm.js  --network development
scripts.migrate:ovm: rm -rf client/contracts/optimism-contracts && truffle migrate --skip-dry-run --config truffle-config.ovm.js --network development --reset
scripts.migrate:goerly-ovm: rm -rf client/contracts/optimism-contracts && truffle migrate --skip-dry-run --config truffle-config.ovm.js --network optimistic_goerli --reset
scripts.gan: ganache -m 'furnace skill box crucial filter find imitate client usual nurse define elbow'
